div.bibl: Saloniki, Oct. 1, 1921. CONSTRUCTION OF SCHOOL BUILDINGList of Contributors and Amounts Paid

body.p: .... These are the names of the people who have made contributions to the fund for the building of a school in Tegea, Greece. The sum total is $606. The committee is headed by Mr. N. Ganan and Mr. A. Kanellos.
Anyone who is patriotic enough to add to this amount should send the money to Mr. Ganan, 68 West Van Buren Street.
